subject: Re: skeptic: My response on Wiltshire Group site
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Sorry you found another reason to complain frank, but some people like 
to hear others research and what they are getting.  I know that shot as 
well as many of your other e-mails are directed at me because your an 
angry bitter person, you may have noticed that i do not say anything 
bad about you. Why would 2 wrongs make a right? I seem to post some 
stuff from all different methods, maybe one will click and move us to a 
better level of communication.  There are other things than the frank's 
box, is that why your mad?

-Steve



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" 
<purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Hummmm, and yet you think this group is somhow more honest and open? 
I 
> was just wondering why yet another attempt at production was 
seemingly 
> derailed, by get this--group members!? Or was it an outside 
influance? 
> I wonder if any of these groups is worth the trouble. I already keep 
> the group e-mail off, cuz I don't care about someone's latest hundred 
> recordings. It seems like just a bunch of showing off. "I just posted 
> the latest....blah-blah-blah-blah" Who gives a crap? 
> 
>  Yeah, negative, maybe. 
> 
> 
>  Frank-S
>
